name: Sarah Chen
tagline: Full-stack architect building scalable systems and mentoring the next generation.
bio: Sarah is a seasoned full-stack engineer with 10+ years of experience building high-traffic web applications. She specializes in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. Previously at Google and Stripe.

name: Alex Rivera
tagline: Design systems enthusiast making the web beautiful and accessible.
bio: Alex is a UI/UX expert passionate about creating intuitive, accessible interfaces. With a background in graphic design and front-end development, they bridge the gap between design and code.

name: Jordan Lee
tagline: Maintainer of popular libraries, advocate for open source culture.
bio: Jordan maintains several widely-used open source libraries and leads Volvox's open source initiatives. They believe in the power of community-driven software development.

name: Elena Rodriguez
tagline: Automating everything, from CI/CD pipelines to cloud infrastructure.
bio: Elena is a DevOps specialist with expertise in containerization, Kubernetes, and cloud-native technologies. She loves optimizing developer workflows and infrastructure.

name: David Kim
tagline: Bridging the gap between engineering and users with data-driven decisions.
bio: David is a product manager who has shipped products used by millions. He combines technical understanding with user empathy to build products people love.

name: Maya Patel
tagline: Crafting delightful mobile experiences for iOS and Android.
bio: Maya leads mobile development at Volvox, with deep expertise in React Native and native iOS/Android development. She's passionate about performance and user experience.

name: Marcus Johnson
tagline: Building robust APIs and distributed systems at scale.
bio: Marcus is a backend specialist with experience at high-growth startups and enterprises. He excels at designing systems that handle millions of requests per second.

name: Lisa Wang
tagline: Applying machine learning to solve real-world problems.
bio: Lisa specializes in machine learning and AI, with experience in NLP, computer vision, and recommendation systems. She helps teams integrate AI into their products.

name: Casey Wu
tagline: Aspiring full-stack developer focused on modern web technologies.
goals: Mastering Next.js and building production-ready applications.
progress: Building a portfolio site and contributing to open source.

name: Jamie Taylor
tagline: Career changer transitioning from finance to software engineering.
goals: Career switch to software engineering with focus on backend.
progress: Learning data structures and algorithms, preparing for interviews.

name: Pat Singh
tagline: Open source enthusiast eager to contribute to major projects.
goals: Becoming an active contributor to open source projects.
progress: First PR merged into a popular library!

name: Sam Wilson
tagline: Backend developer exploring distributed systems and databases.
goals: Deep dive into backend engineering and distributed systems.
progress: Studying distributed systems, building a custom database.

name: Riley Chen
tagline: Designer learning to code to bring designs to life.
goals: Learning front-end development to become a design engineer.
progress: Completed React fundamentals, working on first project.

name: Jordan Brooks
tagline: CS student passionate about mobile app development.
goals: Building and launching a mobile app on the App Store.
progress: Learning React Native, prototyping first app idea.

name: Avery Martinez
tagline: Self-taught developer focusing on cloud and DevOps.
goals: Mastering cloud infrastructure and DevOps practices.
